  2. Biden campaign chair tells demoralized staff 'don't watch cable news' hours after MSNBC appearance  Fox News
  3. Biden pushes party unity as he resists calls to step aside, says he'll return to campaign next week  The Associated Press
  4. Coons, campaign co-chair, says Biden ‘weighing’ who will be best to defeat Trump  The Hill
  5. Defiant Biden vows to stay in race despite growing revolt  The Times of Israel
